sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import "./login.css"; const SignIn = () => { const [isSignUp, setIsSignUp] = useState(false); const toggleForm = () => { setIsSignUp(!isSignUp); }; return (
{isSignUp ? (
Sign Up
) : (
Sign In
Google
Facebook
GitHub
LinkedIn
Otp

or use your email & password

Forget Your Password?

)}
Hello, Buddy!

{isSignUp ? "Already registered?" : "Register with your personal details to use all of site features"}

); }; export default SignIn;
